Rescues in Japan: 'Thought today was the last day of my lif

beats by dre Minami Sanriku, Japan (CNN) -- A 60-year-old Japanese man was rescued Sunday more than nine miles out at sea after clinging to the swept-away remnants of his home for more than two days. monster beats
Prime Minister Naoto Kan said about 15,000 people have been rescued so far.
beats by dre pro
cheap beats by dreSendai residents said the water reached the treetops as it swept into the town. Cars were tossed like toys, windows blasted out and homes crushed or swept away completely.
beats by dre headphones

Analysis: Tiny Bahrain could provoke regional conflict

new true religion jeans(Reuters) - When Saudi Arabian troops rolled into Bahrain to help quell Shi'ite Muslim protests, the world's top oil-exporting region inched closer to a sectarian stand-off that could involve non-Arab Shi'ite power Iran. true religion jeans outlet[/url]true religion jeans outlet</a> cheap true religion jeans"Military intervention from GCC countries means the situation is increasingly untenable for the regime. The paradox the Bahraini regime faces is that it cannot contain the unrest while trying to kick off talks," consultancy Stratfor said.fashion true religion jeans

Rockefeller' formerly living in Baltimore now charged in S.

new true religion jeans A German national arrested in Mount Vernon for kidnapping his daughter in 2008 was charged Wednesday in the death of a California man who disappeared 26 years ago. true religion jeans outlet cheap true religion jeans
Police said Gerhartsreiter rented a guest house from the Sohuses in the early 1980s, using the name Chichester. But in 1985, the couple disappeared, and soon after, Gerhartsreiter left.fashion true religion jeans

Bahrain's king declares martial law

new true religion jeans Bahrain imposes a three-month state of emergency as sectarian strife worsens. Saudi Arabia sends

forces to help quell unrest, inflaming tensions with Iran.true religion jeans outlet

new true religion jeans A military confrontation between Saudi Arabia and Iran over Bahrain is unlikely. But if

clashes between Saudi troops and Bahraini protesters intensify, Iran could use proxies and other covert means to

mount attacks in Bahrain, analysts said, fashion true religion jeans

Bill O'Reilly: Is Nuclear Threat Growing in Japan? | O'Rei

new true religion jeans Right now we know some radiation has leaked into the air at four nuclear reactors which were damaged by the earthquake and the tsunami that followed. Authorities say a couple of dozen people have been treated for radiation intrusion, given iodine to ward off any negative effects.true religion jeans outlet
cheap true religion jeans In the capital city, Tokyo, radiation levels are a bit higher than normal but not in any danger zone. There are 36 million people living in the Tokyo area, so if the nuke plants were to collapse, you can see how bad the situation could become.fashion true religion jeans

Report on NOPD cites 'clear pattern' of excessive force

new true religion jeans In federal court during the past year, prosecutors have accused New Orleans police officers of committing at least seven unjustified shootings in the chaotic days after Hurricane Katrina, resulting in indictments accusing them of civil-rights violations and cover-ups. true religion jeans outlet
cheap true religion jeansThe sergeant shot the man after a lengthy vehicle pursuit. The man denied having pointed the gun at the officer, as did his companions. While NOPD investigators failed to ask for fingerprint analysis on the gun, they did lift fingerprints from the vehicle. fashion true religion jeans

Charlie Sheen tour coming to S.F. April 30 -- tickets on sal

new true religion jeans Charlie Sheen's "Violent Torpedo of Truth" tour has just put San Francisco in its cross hairs.The expanding concert tour starring the actor train-wreck will come to San Francisco's Nob Hill Masonic Center at 8 p.m. April 30, it was announced Friday. Tickets, at $49.50-$106.50, go on sale Saturday morning at www.livenation.com. true religion jeans outlet cheap true religion jeansQUOTE OF THE DAY: "Those hurtful comments really shocked me. At times, it feels like I'm being cyberbullied." -- Singer Rebecca Black, whose video for the insipid song "Friday" has garnered more than 13 million YouTube views and drawn scorn from countless bloggers and others.

Allied Strikes Target Libyan Forces Near Rebel Cities

Allied Strikes Target Libyan Forces Near Rebel Cities

monster beatsAllied airstrikes began targeting Libyan military units loyal to leader Moammar Gadhafi Wednesday as pro-government forces resumed their attacks on rebel-held cities and snipers continued to kill civilians.

dr dre beatsU.S. Rear Admiral Gerard Hueber says the coalition is now directing its firepower against Mr. Gadhafi's ground forces that are "attacking civilian populations in cities," including mechanized units, artillery and mobile missile sites.

beats headphonesWestern planes launched a series of air strikes near the besieged western city of Misrata early Wednesday, temporarily halting government attacks. But loyalist forces later resumed their assault on Libya's third-largest city.

monster headphonesU.S. Defense Secretary Robert Gates says there are "any number of possible outcomes" in Libya and no one is in a position to predict the country's future. He commented on Wednesday from Cairo, where he is holding talks with Egyptian officials on the Middle East uprisings.

beats by dreLate Tuesday, Mr. Gadhafi vowed to emerge victorious in the fight against rebels and international forces. In his first public appearance in a week, he said Libya is ready for battle, whether it be long or short.

Who has right to tell Baby Joseph to die?

Who has right to tell Baby Joseph to die?

Beats by dreBut Canadian doctors refused to perform a life-saving tracheotomy on the child, forcing his parents to rush to St. dr dre headphones Louis for the procedure and setting off a trans-national debate on who has the right to live and who should make the call."I would say they think it's a miracle. It's absolutely astounding," said family friend Brother Paul O'Donnell. "He is on a lot less medication. He is doing phenomenal." beats by dr dre
beats by dre sale Doctors agree that no matter what care Baby Joseph receives, he will not survive the neurological disorder called Leigh Syndrome, a rare genetic disease which attacks the nervous system. It most often strikes children between three months and two years old. beats by dre solo
